name: Tsweetter
description:
Hideo Kocina (and his camera) has to take pictures of a lot of food in order to get back his bentobako, that has been stolen by PIG. 

Tsweetter: Sleeping for Breakfast is a Shoot 'em up made with love and food to all the foodowers of HideoKocina on twitter.

Language: English and Spanish. You can change it from the main menu.

Controls:

- Move: Arrow keys (8 directions. 4 if you are shooting)

- Shoot: Space

- Insulin: Ctrl (reduces blood glucose levels)

- Move an object and one more thing (levels 10 and 11): W, A, S, D. Shift to rotate it.

- Right mouse button to main menu.

Please, enjoy!
